title: Centrally Located 5 Br House For Sale Within Kandy City Limits
details:
30 Mil. ONO

- SPACIOUS two storey house complete with double garage with roller door, and 2 secure gates on both entrances to the property of 22 Perches.

- Situated in Asgiriya (with access routes from Aniwatte and Mahaiyawa) in a quiet residential area within a 7 minute drive from Kandy City and 1km from Gateway.

- Newly renovated ground floor equipped with attached bathrooms with hot water, and a separate assessment number, ideal location for short term sub-letting (Airbnb etc.).

- Approx 2700 sq ft excluding garage & extension above garage which can be converted into roof top garden or pool.

- Two-tier garden spaces both on the lower and upper level of the property.

- 05 Bedrooms with private veranda/balcony, 04 bathrooms, living area, pantry, foyer, patio and French windows on first floor opening onto balcony overlooking lush greenery.

*Foundation was built to accommodate an additional third floor.
** Payment available in 2 instalments.

Please call 072 757 1117 with offers.
No brokers please, principals only.
